settings.name: VIRTUAL_CURSOR
settings.instructions: Verify the Virtual Cursor is active by pressing Alt+Delete. If it is not, exit Forms Mode to activate the Virtual Cursor by pressing Escape.

settings.name: PC_CURSOR
settings.instructions: Verify the PC Cursor is active by pressing Alt+Delete. If it is not, turn off the Virtual Cursor by pressing Insert+Z.

settings.name: BROWSE_MODE
settings.instructions: If NVDA made the focus mode sound when the test page loaded, press Insert+Space to turn browse mode on.

settings.name: FOCUS_MODE
settings.instructions: If NVDA did not make the focus mode sound when the test page loaded, press Insert+Space to turn focus mode on.

settings.name: QUICK_NAV_ON
settings.instructions: Simultaneously press left and right arrow keys. If VoiceOver says 'quick nav off', press left and right arrows again.

settings.name: QUICK_NAV_OFF
settings.instructions: Simultaneously press left and right arrow keys. If VoiceOver says 'quick nav on', press left and right arrows again.
